name: Dimension Switch (kennex3)
description:
You wake up in a world.  This world is not your home.  There is more to this reality.  Not only do you travel up and down.  And side to side.  You also travel... Forward.

You must find keys.  You must switch the... Dimension Switch.

Dedicated to:  Chris-Cross
Written by:  Kennex
Discord:  kennex#1565
Artwork by:  Kenney Assets, with Kennex editing
Sounds by:  Kenney Assets, with Kennex editing
Story and Idea by:  Kennex
Made for:  The  Pygame Game Jam 2022
Made with:  Python and Pygame
Requires:  Windows 10 (exe), or Pygame, Python 3.10, Pytmx
